mapper.insert: insert into product(pro_num, cat_ref, pro_name, pro_price, pro_count, pro_sale, pro_date, pro_contents, pro_warning, color, pro_size) values(product_seq.nextval, #{cat_ref},#{pro_name}, #{pro_price}, #{pro_count},#{pro_sale},sysdate,#{pro_contents},#{pro_warning}, #{color}, #{pro_size})
